pr_title: fix: Exception when importing TEI with relationship [DHIS2-9856]

timeline.message: fix: Exception when importing TEI with relationship

timeline.bodyText: In my refactor, I am actually generating all missing uids. The only thing we need to validate is that isUidInvalid(). This is just a note though, for this PR, keep it like this :)
timeline.author: stian-sandvold

timeline.bodyText:
I am removing the String uid fields from the other models, since we already have fields for uid (trackedEntity, enrollment, event, relationship).
I would like you to use relationship instead here, since the only change we would potentially do here, is to add a new uid if there is no uid already.
timeline.author: stian-sandvold

replies.bodyText: the "relationship" field on Relationship I mean :)
replies.author: stian-sandvold

timeline.message: remove uid and use relationship field instead
